## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency update

## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] My code passes `pnpm lint`
- [ ] My code passes `pnpm typecheck`
- [ ] My code builds successfully (`pnpm build`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] No secrets or credentials in code
- [ ] User inputs are properly validated
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date

### Database Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] Database schema changes are documented
- [ ] Migration scripts are provided
- [ ] Backward compatibility considered

### Breaking Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] I have documented all breaking changes
- [ ] I have updated affected documentation
- [ ] I have provided migration guide

Any additional information that reviewers should know.

## Reviewer Checklist (for maintainers)

- [ ] Code review completed
- [ ] Tests pass in CI
- [ ] Documentation is adequate
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly marked
- [ ] Security implications reviewed
